DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator to determine whether medical imaging surveillance is required.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient require routine cross-sectional imaging of the chest/lungs with CT, MRI, and/or PET?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient require routine cross-sectional imaging of the chest/lungs with CT, MRI, and/or PET for another medical condition?
